name: Mine Sweeper (John)
description:
The classic mine sweeper game.

Controls:

Wasd/Arrows: Move camera.

Left  + Right mouse button: Move camera.

Middle mouse button: Look with camera.

Mouse wheel: Move up and down.

Left mouse: Dig up tile.

Right mouse: Mark tile.

R: Reset cameram.

Esacpe: Menu.

X: Debug menu.

Music:

Vista-Sound13
